item.description:
Women and men suffer more than necessary. We base our happiness on the up and down nature of relationships, work, money and health. Learn to live with the awareness of your deeper nature beyond pain and temporary happiness. Learn practical tips of self-observation, expansive awareness, living in the moment, gratitude, and living beyond the ego. Live in a state of more permanent happiness beyond the conditions of life.

7 to 9:30pm

$40, sliding scale to 20

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is an Enneagram expert with over 20 years experience teaching personality types workshops He is a relationship therapist and coach, working with individuals, couples and families, leads trainings in organizations and gives presentations and workshops throughout the world.

www.herbpearce.com (workshop schedule) and to sign up for his newsletter
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: No More Suffering
